.. _reference.entry.vcard:

:py:attr:`entries[i].vcard`
===========================

An RFC 2426-compliant vCard derived from :ref:`hCard information
<advanced.microformats.hcard>` found in this entry's :abbr:`HTML (HyperText
Markup Language)` content.
